data.message: You donate from the heart not because of obligation or ask to. Remember remember what goes around comes around. It might be your child next time needing that back pack. And if you give from heart you will be rewarded in the end some way or another.  God bless Eminem for doing what he can do his self. He came up in 8 mile trailer park so he knows the real world so stop being haters. # Eminem

replies.message: TY Eminem for like you made me cry happy tears. I love you so much.  I came up poor I had 3 boys my oldest 23 yrs old. He died of a OD  on mothers day 08.  He reminded me of you 100% I will shoot you a picture of him shortly. But I cryed so hard when I seen your like on my comment.  I have all you cds and listen to them. You let me see my son everyday thru you.  # always will love Eminem your my #1
